--create topic testtopic1;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0_1 bigint,
    col1_1 tinyint,
    col2_1 int,
    col3_1 double,
    col4_1 decimal(10, 2),
    col5_1 varchar,
    col6_1 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0_1)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic1",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5",
        "v.v6"
    )
    properties = (
    )
);
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_1 as select * from test_source_1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0_1;
|col0_1|col1_1|col2_1|col3_1|col4_1|col5_1|col6_1|
0 rows returned

--create topic testtopic2;
create source test_source_2(
    col0_2 bigint,
    col1_2 tinyint,
    col2_2 int,
    col3_2 double,
    col4_2 decimal(10, 2),
    col5_2 varchar,
    col6_2 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0_2)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic2",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5",
        "v.v6"
    )
    properties = (
    )
);
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_2 as select * from test_source_2;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_2 order by col0_2;
|col0_2|col1_2|col2_2|col3_2|col4_2|col5_2|col6_2|
0 rows returned

--create topic testtopic3;
create source test_source_3(
    col0_3 bigint,
    col1_3 tinyint,
    col2_3 int,
    col3_3 double,
    col4_3 decimal(10, 2),
    col5_3 varchar,
    col6_3 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0_3)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic3",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5",
        "v.v6"
    )
    properties = (
    )
);
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_3 as select * from test_source_3;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_3 order by col0_3;

--try and create mv with same name;
create materialized view test_mv_3 as select * from test_source_3;
Failed to execute statement: PDB0009 - Materialized view already exists: test.test_mv_3

drop materialized view test_mv_3;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv3 order by col0_3;
Failed to execute statement: PDB0002 - Table 'test.test_mv3' doesn't exist

drop materialized view test_mv_2;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv2 order by col0_2;
Failed to execute statement: PDB0002 - Table 'test.test_mv2' doesn't exist

drop materialized view test_mv_1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv1 order by col0_1;
Failed to execute statement: PDB0002 - Table 'test.test_mv1' doesn't exist

--recreate mv;
create materialized view test_mv_1 as select * from test_source_1;
